key.name: update-interval
key.description: How often to fetch new exchange rates from the API

key.name: primary-currency
key.description: The primary fiat currency in which prices should be displayed

key.name: metals-unit
key.description: Unit for displaying metal prices: gram or troy-ounce

key.name: show-currency-in-panel
key.description: Display the currency symbol or code alongside rates in the panel

key.name: max-panel-items
key.description: Maximum number of rates to display in the panel

key.name: panel-sort-order
key.description: How to sort panel items: none, symbol-asc, symbol-desc, price-asc, price-desc

key.name: panel-position
key.description: Where to place the indicator in the panel: left, center, right

key.name: panel-index
key.description: Position index within the panel box

key.name: panel-separator
key.description: Separator between items in the panel

key.name: panel-item-template
key.description: Template for displaying items in the panel. Use {symbol}, {rate}, {change}, {percent} as placeholders.

key.name: price-change-mode
key.description: How to determine price change: none, previous-update, hour-ago, day-start, day-ago, week-start, week-ago, month-start, month-ago, custom

key.name: first-day-of-week
key.description: Which day is considered the first day of the week for "Start of week" mode: monday, tuesday, wednesday, thursday, friday, saturday, sunday

key.name: custom-reference-date
key.description: The custom date to use as reference for price change calculation (YYYY-MM-DD format)

key.name: available-history-dates
key.description: Cached list of available dates from the API's daily history endpoint

key.name: panel-item-template-up
key.summary: Panel item template for price increase
key.description: Template for displaying items when price has increased. Use {symbol}, {rate}, {change}, {percent} as placeholders.

key.name: panel-item-template-down
key.summary: Panel item template for price decrease
key.description: Template for displaying items when price has decreased. Use {symbol}, {rate}, {change}, {percent} as placeholders.

key.name: menu-item-template
key.description: Template for displaying items in the dropdown menu. Use {symbol}, {rate}, {change}, {percent} as placeholders.

key.name: menu-item-template-up
key.summary: Menu item template for price increase
key.description: Template for displaying items in menu when price has increased.

key.name: menu-item-template-down
key.summary: Menu item template for price decrease
key.description: Template for displaying items in menu when price has decreased.

key.name: click-action
key.description: Action when clicking a rate: graph or clipboard

key.name: clipboard-notification
key.description: Show a notification when a rate is copied to clipboard

key.name: clipboard-template
key.description: Template for copying to clipboard when using display format. Use {symbol} and {rate} as placeholders.

key.name: clipboard-format
key.description: Format of copied text: display-format, formatted-price or price-only

key.name: number-format
key.description: How numbers are formatted: auto, fixed, locale, or compact

key.name: decimal-places
key.description: Number of decimal places to display (0-10)

key.name: use-currency-symbols
key.description: Use symbols like €, $, £ instead of currency codes

key.name: symbol-position
key.description: Where to place the currency symbol: before or after the price

key.description: List of fiat currency symbols to monitor

key.description: Fiat currencies to show in the panel

key.description: Metals to show in the panel

key.description: List of cryptocurrency symbols to monitor

key.name: panel-crypto
key.description: Cryptocurrencies to show in the panel

key.description: List of stock symbols to monitor
